description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course Description:**

This course is designed to enhance students’ proficiency in English in the academic context (EAP). Through intensive and extended reading of text materials, engagements in productive activities, and participation in “authentic” events, students are expected to acquire communication strategies for reading, listening, speaking, and writing, develop fluency and autonomy, and improve critical thinking skills.

**Textbooks**:

1.  課堂學習，Daise, D., Norloff, C., & Carne, P. (2011). _Q: Skills for Success: Reading and Writing, 4._ New York: Oxford University Press. ($ 587; 師大書苑; 02-83695556;台北市和平東路1段182-3號2樓) (Only Reading 1 of each unit)
